casebody.data:
QUALITY BUILT HOMES INCORPORATED, et al.
v.
TOWN OF CARTHAGE. No. 315PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 30, 2015. James E. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. James R. Demay, Concord, Attorney at Law, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Town of Carthage.

Jennifer Welch, Raleigh, Attorney at Law.

James M. Carpenter, General Counsel, for N.C. Home Builders Association, Inc. John T. Benjamin, Jr., Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Leading Builders of America. William E. Hubbard, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Leading Builders of America. Edward F. Hennessey, IV, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Home Builders Association, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of December 2015 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of December 2015."
